lead_paragraph: The former star Roscoe Tanner has been arraigned on felony theft charges. According to the Knox County General Sessions Court, Tanner is accused of writing a $72,263.43 check to a Toyota dealership in Knoxville, Tenn., for two Highlanders and not returning them when the check bounced.
